fields.name: Users must join this server __before__ purchasing, otherwise they will not receive the role and will not be able to use the premium commands.
fields.value: *Note: We can manually assign patron roles for those who did not join before purchasing, however, the process could take a few hours while we wait for an administrator to be available.*

title: Issues with Premium
description:
Any user who bought premium will have one of the following roles depending on the tier purchased:
- Patron: 1 Server
- Super Patron: 3 Servers
- Super Duper Patron: 5 Servers

This enables them to use the premium management commands to assign/remove premium from servers, as well as check which servers they have premium on.
These commands are found on page 7 of the `=help` command, the second to last page.
